com.ronny.ludo.model
Class GameHolder

java.lang.Object
  com.ronny.ludo.model.GameHolder

public class GameHolder
extends java.lang.Object

Game holder/controller This class is a provider/holder of all the elements in the game - the Game class and other remedies which may change if we decide to use another game type.
